pages.text: The Pyre has a variety of uses for the aspiring druid, and is used for crafting herbs as well as performing powerful rituals. Various resources that may be necessary for a ritual are listed elsewhere in this book.$(br2)In all cases, the Pyre is activated by placing the required combination of items onto it, and then igniting it with $(info) nearby fire or flint & steel.

it with a $(info) flint and steel.$(br2)Moreover, ongoing rituals (crafting included) can be canceled by applying a $(l:basics/bucket_of_water)bucket of water$() to the pyre.$(br2)$(info) Rituals will automatically consume relevant ingredients from an inventory placed underneath.$(br2)$(info) The Pyre will also  consume fire around it to attempt to start itself.

pages.title: Pyre
pages.text: Some rituals require $(l:rituals/standing_stones)runestones placed in specific configurations$() in addition to the pyre, or have other requirements.$(br2)$(info) In all cases, these will be displayed on the page after the ingredients of the ritual.
